trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is used as a container for other controls, especially when controls are generated programmatically.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle é usado como um contêiner para outros controles, especialmente quando os controles são gerados por meio de programação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The PanelDesigner class provides design-time support for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controls in a visual designer.
trans-unit.target: A classe PanelDesigner fornece suporte de tempo de design para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controles em um designer visual.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: However, for all new implementations of the Panel control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner> instead of the PanelDesigner.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, para todas as novas implementações do controle de painel, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>em vez de PanelDesigner.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelContainerDesigner>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, a marcação de código-fonte que descreve o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistido no código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> method maps a specified property and value to a specified markup style.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>método mapeia uma propriedade especificada e o valor para um estilo de marcação especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> method provides notification when a behavior is attached to the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A>método fornece uma notificação quando um comportamento está anexado ao designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner>classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Maps a specified property and value to a specified markup style.
trans-unit.target: Mapeia uma propriedade especificada e o valor para um estilo de marcação especificado.

trans-unit.source: The MapPropertyToStyle method provides special handling for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> properties, but calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> base method for all other values of the `propName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método MapPropertyToStyle fornece um tratamento especial para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A>Propriedades, mas chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>base do método para todos os outros valores da `propName` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the property name.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: An object that is the property value.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é o valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Provides notification when a behavior is attached to the designer.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma notificação quando um comportamento está anexado ao designer.

trans-unit.source: The OnBehaviorAttached method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método OnBehaviorAttached o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A>método de base.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ReadWriteControlDesigner.OnBehaviorAttached%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then the OnBehaviorAttached maps the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> properties to the appropriate style by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> method, if these properties are defined.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, o OnBehaviorAttached mapeia o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A>Propriedades para o estilo apropriado usando a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A>método, se essas propriedades são definidas.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PanelDesigner.MapPropertyToStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.HorizontalAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel.BackImageUrl%2A>
